snippet: A Senate committee passed a bill in favor of a tax break for the wind industry on a bipartisan vote on Thursday, helped by Republicans from states where wind power is common.
abstract: Senate Finance Committee passes tax credit bill for the wind industry on a bipartisan vote, helped by Republicans from states where wind power is common; renewed credit, which apples to projects under construction by the end of 2013, will cost $3.3 billion.
lead_paragraph: A Senate committee passed a bill in favor of a tax break for the wind industry on a bipartisan vote on Thursday, helped by Republicans from states where wind power is common.

headline.seo: Wind Industry Wins Senate Panel’s Support for a Tax Break
headline.main: Amid a Political Calm, a Tax Break for the Wind Industry Advances
headline.print_headline: Amid a Political Calm, a Tax Break for the Wind Industry Advances
